long_description: The Nathan LightBender Armband Light wraps around your arm to provide 360deg visibility while running or biking. Comfortable silicone, ABS plastic and elastic armband ensures no chafing or discomfort. Settings offer blinking or solid modes; large push button for easy operation. Waterproof design keeps rain and sweat out. Replaceable watch battery offers 100+ hours of illumination, battery included. Fits arms 9 in. and larger.
short_description: The Nathan LightBender Armband Light wraps around your arm to provide 360deg visibility while running or biking.
